text: Enniskillen Beckett Festival, review: 'a chance to both soul-search and sightsee' A Samuel Beckett festival provides a unique opportunity to combine sightseeing with thoughts of loneliness and death Compagnie Maguy Marin perform at the Enniskillen Beckett Festival
